title: Powers of the director
context: [ยง445-95.3] Powers of the director. The director of the department of human services may examine and investigate the affairs of every person, partnership, corporation, or other organization engaged in the rooming house business in this State in order to determine whether any unfair or deceptive practice prohibited by section 445-95.1 has been committed. [L 1988, c 313, pt of ยง3]
